home.heroSubtitle: Describe your agent's behavior in natural language. GiLo AI configures it, connects it to your tools, and deploys it in minutes.
home.terminalDesc1: A customer support agent that answers questions,
home.terminalDesc2: queries the knowledge base and escalates if needed
home.featuresSubtitle: A complete platform to design, test, and deploy AI agents connected to your tools and data.
home.featureStudioDesc: Create conversational AI agents by describing their behavior in natural language.
home.featureModelsDesc: Choose from GPT-4, Claude, Mistral and other LLMs to power your agents.
home.featureToolsDesc: Connect your agents to APIs, databases, and external services via MCP.
home.featurePlaygroundDesc: Test and iterate on your agents in real time before deploying.
home.featureDeployDesc: Deploy your agents as APIs, chat widgets, or bots with built-in monitoring.
home.featureSecurityDesc: Authentication, rate limiting, and comprehensive logging for every deployed agent.
home.howSubtitle: From idea to a deployed AI agent in minutes.
home.howStep1Desc: Describe your agent's role, tone, and capabilities in natural language.
home.howStep2Desc: Connect tools (APIs, databases, MCP) and fine-tune the system instructions.
home.howStep3Desc: Test in the playground then deploy as API, widget, or bot in one click.
home.testimonialsSubtitle: See what our users think about GiLo AI.
home.testimonial1: I built a customer support agent in 30 minutes. It responds better than our old chatbot.
home.testimonial2: We deployed 5 internal agents in a week. The MCP integration with our APIs is magical.
home.testimonial3: The playground lets you test and iterate in real time. My agents improve with each session.
home.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of creators using GiLo AI to deploy intelligent agents.

chat.describeAgent: Describe your agent — Powered by GitHub Copilot
chat.placeholder: Describe what you want to build...
chat.quickSupportPrompt: Create a customer support agent that answers FAQs, checks a knowledge base, and escalates to humans if needed.
chat.quickAnalysePrompt: Create a data analysis agent that can read CSVs, generate reports, and answer questions about data.
chat.quickDevPrompt: Create a developer assistant agent that helps write code, debug, and explain technical concepts.
chat.quickRagPrompt: Create a RAG agent that can index documents, search a knowledge base, and answer with sources.

models.gpt41NanoDesc: Ultra fast, ideal for simple chat

privacy.heroSubtitle: GiLo AI applies the strictest standards for data protection, user isolation, and GDPR compliance. Every line of code is designed to protect your information.
privacy.isolationContent: Every resource (agents, projects, files, conversations, API keys, webhooks, knowledge base) is strictly siloed by user ID. No user can access another user's data.
privacy.isolationItem1: Ownership check on every protected API route
privacy.isolationItem2: Agents, projects, and deployments are filtered by JWT-derived userId
privacy.isolationItem3: The store verifies ownership before publication or deletion
privacy.isolationItem4: Sessions are tied to JWT — impossible to spoof a userId via request body or headers
privacy.isolationItem5: MCP services and tasks require valid authentication
privacy.authContent: Authentication is based on signed JSON Web Tokens (JWT), verified on every request. No bypass mechanisms are allowed, even in development mode.
privacy.authItem2: No x-user-id bypass — removed in both development and production
privacy.authItem3: Passwords hashed with bcrypt (12 salt rounds)
privacy.authItem4: JWT token contains no sensitive personal data (no email)
privacy.dataContent: Your data is stored in a PostgreSQL database hosted on Azure with strict access controls. Database relationships ensure cascade deletion for data integrity.
privacy.dataItem2: Cascade deletion — deleting your account removes all associated data
privacy.dataItem3: API keys stored as SHA-256 hashes (irreversible)
privacy.encryptionContent: All communications and sensitive data are protected with enterprise-grade encryption.
privacy.encryptionItem1: TLS 1.3 for all client ↔ server and server ↔ database connections
privacy.encryptionItem3: Vector embeddings (pgvector) are stored in the same secured database
privacy.gdprContent: GiLo AI is designed to comply with the European Union's General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
privacy.gdprItem1: Article 7 — Consent tracking with version and timestamp
privacy.gdprItem2: Article 15 — Right of access: export all your data in one click
privacy.gdprItem3: Article 17 — Right to erasure: complete and irreversible account deletion
privacy.gdprItem4: Article 20 — Data portability: export in structured JSON format
privacy.gdprItem5: No personal data is sold or shared with third parties
privacy.rightsContent: Under the GDPR, you have extensive rights over your personal data that you can exercise at any time.
privacy.rightsItem1: Right of access — View all the data we hold about you (GET /api/auth/export)
privacy.rightsItem2: Right to rectification — Update your personal information at any time
privacy.rightsItem3: Right to portability — Export your agents, conversations, and files as JSON
privacy.rightsItem4: Right to object — Contact us for any specific request
privacy.deletionContent: You can permanently delete your account and all your data at any time. This action is irreversible.
privacy.deletionItem1: Cascade deletion: account, agents, conversations, messages, API keys, webhooks, knowledge files
privacy.deletionItem3: No backup copies are retained after deletion
privacy.infraContent: Our infrastructure is hosted on Microsoft Azure in the Canada Central region with enterprise-grade security measures.
privacy.infraItem1: Azure Container Apps for the backend with auto-scaling
privacy.infraItem2: Azure PostgreSQL Flexible Server with high availability
privacy.infraItem3: Azure Static Web Apps for the frontend with global CDN
privacy.infraItem4: Automated CI/CD via GitHub Actions with security checks
privacy.logsContent: Application logs are designed to never contain personally identifiable information (PII).
privacy.logsItem1: No personal data (email, password, content) in server logs
privacy.logsItem2: Error messages are sanitized — only error.message is logged
privacy.logsItem3: API error responses never disclose implementation details
privacy.contactContent: If you have questions about the protection of your data or wish to exercise your GDPR rights, contact our team.

terms.heroSubtitle: By using GiLo AI, you agree to the following terms. Please read them carefully before using our services.
terms.acceptanceContent: By accessing or using GiLo AI, you agree to be bound by these terms of service. If you do not accept these terms, you must not use the service.
terms.acceptanceItem1: These terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and GiLo AI
terms.acceptanceItem2: You must be at least 16 years old to use this service
terms.acceptanceItem3: We reserve the right to modify these terms with 30 days' notice
terms.descriptionContent: GiLo AI is a SaaS platform for creating, configuring, testing, and deploying custom AI agents.
terms.descriptionItem1: AI agent builder with model configuration, system prompt, and tools
terms.descriptionItem2: Real-time test playground with SSE streaming
terms.descriptionItem3: Agent store to publish and share your creations
terms.descriptionItem4: Public API with access keys for external integration
terms.descriptionItem5: RAG knowledge base with vector embeddings (pgvector)
terms.accountsContent: Each user must create an account to access protected features. You are responsible for the security of your credentials.
terms.accountsItem1: One account per user — multiple accounts are prohibited
terms.accountsItem2: You are responsible for keeping your password confidential
terms.accountsItem3: Report any unauthorized access to your account immediately
terms.accountsItem4: You can delete your account and all your data at any time (GDPR Art. 17)
terms.tiersContent: GiLo AI offers multiple service tiers with quotas adapted to each use case.
terms.tiersItem1: Free: 3 projects max, 100 MB storage, 5 deployments/month
terms.tiersItem2: Pro: 10 projects max, 5 GB storage, 20 deployments/month
terms.tiersItem3: Exceeding quotas blocks the action (no surprise charges)
terms.tiersItem4: You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time
terms.usageContent: You agree to use GiLo AI responsibly and in compliance with applicable laws.
terms.usageItem1: Use the service only for lawful and legitimate purposes
terms.usageItem2: Respect the intellectual property rights of others
terms.usageItem3: Do not overload the infrastructure with abusive requests (rate limiting enforced)
terms.usageItem4: Do not bypass security or authentication mechanisms
terms.prohibitedContent: The following activities are strictly prohibited and will result in immediate account suspension.
terms.prohibitedItem1: Creating agents that produce illegal, hateful, discriminatory, or misleading content
terms.prohibitedItem2: Using the service for spam, phishing, or social engineering
terms.prohibitedItem3: Attempting to access other users' data
terms.prohibitedItem4: Using the service for cryptocurrency mining or running malicious code
terms.prohibitedItem5: Reverse-engineering or systematic scraping of the platform
terms.ipContent: The GiLo AI platform and its source code are protected by copyright. However, you retain full ownership of your creations.
terms.ipItem1: You remain the owner of your agents, prompts, files, and configurations
terms.ipItem2: Agents published to the store are under the license you define
terms.ipItem3: GiLo AI claims no rights over content generated by your agents
terms.liabilityContent: GiLo AI provides the service 'as is' without warranty of any kind, express or implied.
terms.liabilityItem1: The service is provided without guarantee of continuous availability (best-effort SLA)
terms.liabilityItem2: GiLo AI is not responsible for content generated by AI models
terms.liabilityItem3: In no event shall liability exceed the amount paid for the service in the last 12 months
terms.terminationContent: Either party may terminate this agreement at any time, subject to the following conditions.
terms.terminationItem1: You can delete your account at any time via DELETE /api/auth/account
terms.terminationItem2: GiLo AI may suspend an account for violation of these terms
terms.terminationItem3: Upon termination, all your data is cascade-deleted within 30 days
terms.governingContent: These terms are governed by the applicable law in the following jurisdictions.
terms.governingItem1: Canadian law for general contractual matters
terms.governingItem2: EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) for personal data protection
terms.governingItem3: Any dispute shall be submitted to mediation before any legal action
terms.contactContent: If you have questions about these terms or wish to report an abuse, contact our legal team.
